Oklahoma_City.Cristo Rey OKC: Cristo Rey OKC is a Roman Catholic, private high school founded by the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Oklahoma City in 2018 to provide college preparatory education to students who could not otherwise access it. In conjunction with local businesses, the students' education is subsidized through the work-study model characteristic of schools in the Cristo Rey Network, of which it is a member. Scheduled to open in fall 2018, the high school is located on the campus of Oklahoma State University–Oklahoma City.
